Title: Gem Drill
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Raven Molisee, Paul Villeco, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle, Deedee Magno
Plot: Since Garnet, Pearl and Amethyst can't return immediately, Steven and Peridot must start drilling down the Earth's core by themselves to find a way to stop Cluster's awakening.
